snippet: Crews dug through a gutted Detroit medical building on Tuesday, searching for two people unaccounted for after shots were fired inside and the structure was set on fire, the police said.
abstract: Crews dig through gutted Detroit medical building, searching for two people unaccounted for after shots were fired inside and structure was set on fire.
lead_paragraph: Crews dug through a gutted Detroit medical building on Tuesday, searching for two people unaccounted for after shots were fired inside and the structure was set on fire, the police said.

headline.main: Michigan: Two Missing in Arson at Medical Building
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Two Missing In Arson at Medical Building
